column1: '''The Siege of Gondor (scene)''' is the twenty-ninth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and the thirty-sixth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]]. It was extended in the latter edition.
